content:
NodeDeactivationStatus NodeDeactivationStatus Enum

Definition

Namespace:
Assembly:
System.Fabric.dll

Specified the status for a node deactivation task.

Edit

In this Article

public enum NodeDeactivationStatusPublic Enum NodeDeactivationStatus

Fields

Completed Completed

The task is completed.
None None

No status is associated with the task.
SafetyCheckComplete SafetyCheckComplete

All the safety checks have been completed for the task.
SafetyCheckInProgress SafetyCheckInProgress

Safety checks are in progress for the task.
